actions.name: Use
actions.spellEffect: 10-ft.-by-80-ft. fissure in the earth, 40 ft. deep

system.shortDescription: With a thrust of tectonic energy, you split the earth. Each creature standing in the area where the fissure opens must succeed at a Reflex saving throw to avoid falling into the rift. Those standing adjacent to the fissure when it is created must succeed at a Reflex save or be knocked prone by tremors. This spell is effective only when cast on an area of dirt, earth, sand, or stone.
